testcase.name: testOptionWithoutShortFormat

failure.message: expected:<usage: foobar [-a[] [--bbb] [-c] -a,--aaa aaaaaaa --bbb bbbbbbb -c ccccccc] > but was:<usage: foobar [-a[asdf] [-casdf] [-nullasdf] -aasdf,--aaa aaaaaaa -casdf ccccccc -nullasdf,--bbb bbbbbbb] >

testcase.name: testOptionWithoutShortFormat2

failure.message: expected:<...[--config <arg>] [-h[] [-l <arg>] [-n] [-r <arg>] [-s <arg>] [-t] [-v] header -a,--age <arg> Age (in days) of cache item before being recomputed --config <arg> Use the specified configuration file -h,--help print this message -l,--limit <arg> Set time limit for execution, in mintues -n,--new Create NLT cache entries only for new items -r,--results <arg> Number of results per item -s,--server <arg> The NLT server address -t,--tracker Create NLT cache entries only for tracker items -v,--version ] print version in...> but was:<...[--config <arg>] [-h[asdf] [-l <arg>] [-nasdf] [-r <arg>] [-s <arg>] [-tasdf] [-vasdf] header -a,--age <arg> Age (in days) of cache item before being recomputed --config <arg> Use the specified configuration file -hasdf,--help print this message -l,--limit <arg> Set time limit for execution, in mintues -nasdf,--new Create NLT cache entries only for new items -r,--results <arg> Number of results per item -s,--server <arg> The NLT server address -tasdf,--tracker Create NLT cache entries only for tracker items -vasdf,--version] print version in...>
